data.eml:eml: Systematics of Old World Odontacolus Kieffer s. l. (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae s. l.): parasitoids of spider eggs

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article A. Valerio, Alejandro, Austin, Andrew D., Masner, Lubomir, Johnson, Norman F. (2013): Systematics of Old World Odontacolus Kieffer s. l. (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae s. l.): parasitoids of spider eggs. ZooKeys 314: 1-151, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.314.3475, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.314.3475
